string-array.name: actions
string-array.item:
# Toggle inverted screen colors
mdnie_status=`cat /sys/class/mdnie/mdnie/negative`
 if [ "$mdnie_status" -eq "0" ]; then
 echo 1 > /sys/class/mdnie/mdnie/negative
 else
 echo 0 > /sys/class/mdnie/mdnie/negative
 fi;
service call phone 2 s16 \"your beloved number\"

service call bluetooth 1 | grep "0 00000000" 
 if [ "$?" -eq "0" ]; then
 service call bluetooth 3 
 else
 [ "$1" -eq "1" ] && service call bluetooth 5 
 [ "$1" -ne "1" ] && service call bluetooth 4 
 fi;

service call wifi 14 | grep "0 00000001" > /dev/null
 if [ "$?" -eq "0" ]; then
 service call wifi 13 i32 1 > /dev/null
 else
 service call wifi 13 i32 0 > /dev/null
 fi;
# Simulate key press - Media Play/Pause\ninput keyevent 85\n
# Simulate key press - Volume Mute/Unmute\ninput keyevent 164\n

service call vibrator 2 i32 100 i32 0
 dumpsys activity a | grep "Recent #1:.* com.anddoes.launcher"
 if [ "$?" -eq "0" ]; then
 service call activity 24 i32 `dumpsys activity a | grep "Recent #2:" | grep -o -E "#[0-9]+ " | cut -c2-` i32 2
 else
 service call activity 24 i32 `dumpsys activity a | grep "Recent #1:" | grep -o -E "#[0-9]+ " | cut -c2-` i32 2
 fi
# Simulate key press - Volume Up\ninput keyevent 24\n
# Simulate key press - Volume Down\ninput keyevent 25\n
# Simulate key press - Media Stop\ninput keyevent 86\n
# Simulate key press - Media Next\ninput keyevent 87\n
# Simulate key press - Media Previous\ninput keyevent 88\n
# Simulate key press - Recent Apps\ninput keyevent 187\n
service call activity 79 s16 \`dumpsys activity top | grep \'^TASK.*\' | cut -d \' \' -f2\`\n
